hero.title: Professional Electrical Installations for Your Home and Business
hero.subtitle: Voltage Elektroin≈°talacije s.p. provides quality electrical services in Slovenia. With over 10 years of experience, we are your reliable partner for all electrical needs.

odpravljanje-napak.title: Fault Repair
odpravljanje-napak.details: Fast and reliable repair of electrical faults. We are available 24 hours a day, 7 days a week for emergency cases. We use the most modern equipment for diagnosing and solving problems.

nove-instalacije.title: New Electrical Installations
nove-instalacije.description: Complete electrical installations for new apartments and houses
nove-instalacije.details: Design and implementation of new electrical installations for residential and commercial buildings. We ensure quality execution in accordance with current standards and regulations.
